interests.headline: Interests
content: Involved in video streams (Video games,Software development)

summary.headline: Personal Statement
summary.content: A video game lover, an all kind of travel enthusiast and an admirer of decent coffee. Software developer with no commercial experience in backend and frontend development with modern technologies. My long term professional goal is to acquire skills necessary to work as a software architect.

content.description:
Experienced working on different layers of Spring MVC architecture such as Spring-Controller, service and repository classes.	Expertise in developing SOAP,RESTful Webservices and APIs with JSON.
Configuring the data source in the hibernate configuration file.
	Good experience working on Hibernate Beans & HQL to map to tables and retrieve data from the database.
Responsible to create DAO CRUD methods using Hibernate & Spring framework.

Worked upon the concepts of Objects, Classes and their relationships and how to model them, implementing Hibernate ORM tool, worked whit DAOs, Services and Controllers, worked on Angular Service which interacts with RESTful services at backend.
